purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 猪)
Pictophonetic: 者 indicates the sound; 豕 (animal) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
豬場 [ zhū chǎng ]: piggery
豬八戒 [ zhū bā jiè ]: Zhu Bajie, character in Journey to the West 西游记 , with pig-like characteristics and armed with a muckrake; Pigsy in Arthur Waley's translation
豬油 [ zhū yóu ]: lard
豬狗 [ zhū gǒu ]: pig-dog (intended as insult); Schweinhund

heisig_chinese_memo: Miss piggy is not just anyone.  She's someone.  She's the hottest pig around.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: My puppet is made of special pheremone impregnated vinyl. Unfortunately, a pack of wild dogs mistook her for a pig and tore her to pieces. Oh dear!
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " hog ", " who " sound, the original meaning of pigs. In ancient times, " pig " and " hog " were similar, and the two characters were different in dialects.

"Dialects" Volume 8: "Pig, between North Yan and North Korea, is called Zhizhi, Guandong is called Zhilu, or called Pig. Southern Chu is called Pig, its son is called Pig, or called Pig, between Wu and Yang that of Iko. "" pig "and" hog "the only other dialects, can be found in" hog "," boar "," pig "," pig "," dolphin "," Xi "Zhu word. "Shuowen": "Pigs live in hogs and three hairs in clusters. From the hogs, the voices." Duan Yucai's note: "Three hairs live in clusters, which means that one hole gives birth to three hairs." Click on a pore of the " pig " Three hairs grow out, which is the so-called " hao " or " hyena ", that is, the hard mane on the neck of a pig.

Bronze inscription is used as a person's name, and for 27 years, he has been guarded: "The painter master pig."

Qin Bamboo Slips are used as the original meaning, referring to pigs, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. "Closed Diagnosis Style" Jian 76: "The upper is like a pig's sinus." "Pig's sinus" is the cave where pigs live.
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hog ", " who " sound, the original meaning of pigs.
humanum_full_description:
從「豕」，「者」聲，本義是豬隻。古代「豬」、「豕」相通，二字為方言之別。

　　《方言》卷八：「豬，北燕朝鮮之間謂之豭，關東西或謂之彘，或謂之豕。南楚謂之豨，其子或謂之豚，或謂之貕，吳揚之間謂之豬子。」「豬」與「豕」僅為方言之別，可參見「豕」、「豭」、「彘」、「豨」、「豚」、「貕」諸字。《說文》：「豬，豕而三毛叢居者。从豕，者聲。」段玉裁注：「三毛叢居，謂一孔生三毛也。」按「豬」的一個毛孔長出三條毛，也就是所謂「豪」或「鬣」，即豬頸上堅硬的鬃毛，可見其形之驃悍。

　　金文用作人名，二十七年上守趞戈：「漆工師豬。」

　　秦簡用作本義，指豬隻，《睡虎地秦簡．封診式》簡76：「上如豬竇狀」，「豬竇」即豬隻所住的洞穴。

豬豬RS
猪猪 		pig, hog, wild boar
  • pig 豕 raised by a man 者 (looks like a dog 犭)
(Simplified: 猪)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 者 indicates the sound; 豕 (animal) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 豕 [ shǐ ] pig, boar
    • 者 [ zhě ] that which; they who; those who
①豬隻，組成豬科(suidae)的各種哺乳動物的任一種，四肢短小，尾短，體毛稀疏，鼻面短凹或平直，耳大下垂或前挺，被毛較粗，有黑、白或黑白花等色，汁腺不發達，熱時喜浸水散熱；特指家養種的成員。［合］豬魈(豬怪；豬精)；豬膀胱(又稱“豬尿泡”、“豬胞”、“豬尿脬”、“豬脬”)；小豬(又叫“豬牙子”、“豬仔”、“豬娃”、“豬娃子”)；母豬(又叫“豬婆”、“豬婆子”、“豬娘”)。
②十二生肖之一，配地支的“亥”。［合］屬豬的；豬年(俗稱十二生肖之一豬所代表的年份，即亥年)。

豬油 [ zhū yóu ]: lard
豬狗 [ zhū gǒu ]: pig-dog (intended as insult); Schweinhund

Chinese: Miss piggy is not just anyone. She's someone. She's the hottest pig around.

從「 豕 」，「 者 」聲，本義是豬隻。古代「 豬 」、「 豕 」相通，二字為方言之別。 《方言》卷八：「豬，北燕朝鮮之間謂之豭，關東西或謂之彘，或謂之豕。南楚謂之豨，其子或謂之豚，或謂之貕，吳揚之間謂之豬子。」「 豬 」與「 豕 」僅為方言之別，可參見「 豕 」、「 豭 」、「 彘 」、「 豨 」、「 豚 」、「 貕 」諸字。《說文》：「豬，豕而三毛叢居者。从豕，者聲。」段玉裁注：「三毛叢居，謂一孔生三毛也。」按「 豬 」的一個毛孔長出三條毛，也就是所謂「 豪 」或「 鬣 」，即豬頸上堅硬的鬃毛，可見其形之驃悍。 金文用作人名，二十七年上守趞戈：「漆工師豬。」 秦簡用作本義，指豬隻，《睡虎地秦簡．封診式》簡76：「上如豬竇狀」，「豬竇」即豬隻所住的洞穴。

"Dialects" Volume 8: "Pig, between North Yan and North Korea, is called Zhizhi, Guandong is called Zhilu, or called Pig. Southern Chu is called Pig, its son is called Pig, or called Pig, between Wu and Yang that of Iko. "" pig"and" hog"the only other dialects, can be found in" hog"," boar"," pig"," pig"," dolphin"," Xi"Zhu word. "Shuowen": "Pigs live in hogs and three hairs in clusters. From the hogs, the voices." Duan Yucai's note: "Three hairs live in clusters, which means that one hole gives birth to three hairs." Click on a pore of the " pig" Three hairs grow out, which is the so-called " hao" or " hyena", that is, the hard mane on the neck of a pig. Bronze inscription is used as a person's name, and for 27 years, he has been guarded: "The painter master pig." Qin Bamboo Slips are used as the original meaning, referring to pigs, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. "Closed Diagnosis Style" Jian 76: "The upper is like a pig's sinus." "Pig's sinus" is the cave where pigs live.

豬字的基本解释

豬
zhū
同“猪”。

豬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhū］
［《廣韻》陟魚切，平魚，知。］
亦作“1”。
(1)同“猪”、哺乳动物。
(2)“瀦”的古字。谓水停聚。

豬字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豬； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1198第02
【唐韻】陟魚切【集韻】【韻會】張如切，?著平聲。【說文】豕而三毛叢居者。【爾雅·釋獸】豕子豬。【註】今亦曰彘，江東呼豨，皆通名。【揚子·方言】吳揚之閒謂之豬子。【埤雅】豬性?而率。【揚子·太?經】出野見虛，有虎牧豬。　又山豬，卽豪豬也。詳前豪字註。　又嶺南有嬾婦豬。【桂海虞衡志】嬾婦似山豬而小，喜食禾。田夫以機軸織絍之器掛田所，則不復近。　又貓豬。【楊愼·丹鉛錄】毛犀卽彖也。善知吉凶，古人呼爲貓豬，交廣人謂之豬神。　又石豬。【蜀志】蜻蛉縣有石豬，子母數千頭，傳言夷昔牧豬于此，一朝豬化爲石。　又官名。【魏志·東夷傳】夫餘國以六畜名官，一曰豬加。　又草名。【博雅】伏豬，木禾也。　又藥名。【本草綱目】陶弘景曰：豬苓，其塊黑似豬屎，故名。互詳前豕豨二字註。　又山水名。【山海經】渠豬之山，渠豬之水出焉，而南流注于河。　又湫名。【北夢瑣言】邛州有湫，有牝豕出入，號豬龍湫。　又州名。【唐書·地理志】豬拔州，隸隴右道。　又【廣韻】豬口，地名。亦作䐗。【晉書·甘

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhū］
["Guangyun" Zhiyu cut, flat fish, know. ]
Also called "1".
(1) Same as "pig" and mammal.
(2) The ancient character of "潴". That the water stops gathering.
pig
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Wu Character Department】　猪; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1198 No. 02
[Tang Yun] Zhiyu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zhang Ruqie, with a flat voice. [Said the text] Those who live in hogs and three hairs. 【Erya·Shi Beast】Pig and pig. [Note] Today is also called "彘, Jiangdong Hu豨", they are all common names. [Yangtze Dialect] Wu Yangzhi Xian called the pig. 【Piya】Swine sex and rate. [Yangtze·Tai? Classic] Going out to see the emptiness, there are tigers and pigs.　There are wild boars and porcupines. Please refer to the previous Hao word note.　There are slut pigs in Lingnan. 【Guihai Yu Hengzhi】Slacks are small like wild boars and like to eat grains. Tian Fu uses the machine-shaft weaving scorpion tool to hang Tiansuo, but it is not close.　Maozhu again. 【Yang Ming·Danqian Record】Mao Xi 卽 also. The good knows good and bad, the ancients called the cat and pig, and the acquaintance called the pig god.　Stone pig again. [Shu Zhi] There are stone pigs in Qingchi County, with thousands of offsprings. It is said that Yixi has herded pigs here, and once the pigs turned into stones.　Also official name. [Weizhi·Dongyi Biography] Husband Yu State uses six animals as officials, one is pig plus.　Also cursive name. [Bo Ya] Fu Zhu, Mu He also.　Also the name of the medicine. [Compendium of Materia Medica] Tao Hongjing said: Polyporus umbellatus, its black like pig dung, hence the name. Mutual details before the word hog 豨 two notes.　The name of the landscape. [Shanhaijing] The mountain of the pig, the water of the pig flows out of Yan, and the south flows into the river.　Yu Ming. [Beimeng trivial words] Qiongzhou has Qiu, and there are hogs in and out, named Zhulongqiu.　Also the name of the state. [Book of Tang·Geography] Zhubazhou, under Longyou Road.　[Guangyun] Zhukou, place name. Also known as 䐗. 【Jin Shu·Gan
